Translations.Text: dir mi inspir ke grup jinns auxskult tiam dir ‘Ni auxd wonderful Quran
‘Gxi direkt righteousness ni hav kred en gxi; ni neniam set any idols our Lord
Plej Alt est our nur Lord Li neniam hav mate nor fil
‘Gxi est foolish among us uz utter such nonsense DI
‘Ni pens ke nek humans nor jinns possibly utter mensog DI
Human beings uz streb potenc jinn beings ili nur aflikt them a lot de adversity
‘Ili pens just vi opini DI ne send another (messenger)
‘Ni tusx heaven trov gxi filled formidable gard projectiles
‘Ni uz sid tie en ord spion! Anyone auxskult pursued powerful projectile
‘Ni ne hav ide io mav intenc inhabitants Ter aux se their Lord vol redeem them
‘"Kelk da us est righteous kelk est malpli than righteous; ni sekv various paths
‘Ni kon plen put ni neniam kur DI Ter; ni neniam kur escape
When ni auxd guidance ni kred therein. Anyone kred en his Lord neniam tim any injustice nor any affliction
‘Among us est submitters us est compromisers. ' As por those submitted ili est dekstr path
As por compromisers ili est fuel por Gehenna
Ili ceter dekstr path ni ben them abund akv
Ni surely test them all As por him disregards message his Lord Li direct him ever increasing retribution
Met worship aparten al DI; ne vok sur anyone aux DI
When di servant advokat Him sol preskaux all da them band together oppose him
